attributes.action: Amend UK Laws to improve the protection of public sector whistleblowers
attributes.background: Too many public sector workers are being bullied out of the work place because they have raised concerns.  It is time to finally end the discrimination many employees face day to day as a direct result of whistleblowing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to protect whistleblowers in the public sector.
